title: Life Is Good (Nas album)
summary: Life Is Good is the eleventh studio album by American rapper Nas, released on July 13, 2012, by Def Jam Recordings.[nb 1] The album was recorded at various studios in New York and California, with guest appearances from rappers Large Professor and Rick Ross, and singers Mary J. Blige, Miguel, and, posthumously, Amy Winehouse, among others.
